item.description:
We are extremely fortunately to have Madison resident Leslie Singer as the guest speaker for our October meeting. Leslie is creative Brand Strategist and owner of Manhattan based consultancy SingerSalt. She will share 'under the hood' branding tactics that can be a game changer for any business in any category. She has worked with the likes of American Express, Avon, Hallmark, MasterCard and General Motors to name some of the big guys. Her current clients range from technology and media companies to start ups and Fortune 500 giants.
Come learn what the “Big Guys” know about branding from a leader in the field.
item.name: How to RE brand your business with Leslie Singer
